questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Video gaming

B) At a beach
C) Inside a home
D) In a museum

B) A television screen
C) A bookshelf
D) A window

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A book
C) A television screen showing a video game
D) A plant

A) A park
B) A beach
